UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Association of idealized amphiphiles and protease inhibitors: Conferring antimicrobial peptides with stable antibacterial activity under physiological conditions to combat multidrug-resistant bacteria
Literature.Author: Zhu Y, Li B, Xu W, Wang Y, Li G, Bi C, Shao C, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=32 µM,Pig kidney epithelial cells PK15:65% Cytotoxicity=32 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=7µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3µM),Escherichia coli K88(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=2µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CVCC 503(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=2µM)
